channel.title: CVE Feed for Theme Horse -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Theme Horse -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-49701|2024-10-23T18:44:53.520Z -- theme%20horse -- mags
item.description: Improper Control of Filename for Include/Require Statement in PHP Program ('PHP Remote File Inclusion') vulnerability in Theme Horse Mags.This issue affects Mags: from n/a through 1.1.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-35758|2024-08-02T03:14:53.987Z -- theme%20horse -- interface
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Theme Horse Interface allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Interface: from n/a through 3.1.0.
